Interface_name: HTTP Server - side by using Flask in python
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a RESTful API gateway service using Flask that handles incoming requests, processes them through an MII client, and provides health check and termination endpoints.

Class Description: RestfulGatewayThread is a threaded Flask server implementation that creates and manages a RESTful API gateway for interacting with an MII client. It handles request processing, health checks, and graceful shutdown.

Attributes:

_deployment_name: str - The name of the MII deployment to connect to
_rest_host: str - The host address to bind the server to
_rest_port: int - The port number to listen on
_rest_procs: int - Number of processes to handle requests
_stop_event: threading.Event - Event flag to track server status
server: werkzeug.serving.BaseWSGIServer - The Flask server instance

Methods:

__init__(deployment_name: str, rest_host: str, rest_port: int, rest_procs: int) -> None - Initializes the thread with server configuration parameters
_create_server(deployment_name: str, rest_host: str, rest_port: int, rest_procs: int) -> werkzeug.serving.BaseWSGIServer - Creates and configures the Flask server with routes and resources
_shutdown() -> None - Handles server shutdown after a configured timeout period
run() -> None - Starts the server and runs it indefinitely until shutdown
get_stop_event() -> threading.Event - Returns the stop event for monitoring server status
